author: {'steamid': '76561198085479960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1873, 'last_played': 1497798436}
review:
Пожалуй, оставлю все же положительный отзыв, так как наиграл некоторое количество часов в ней и не могу сказать, что играл полнейший кал, нет это совсем не так! 
Задумка сама по себе очень хорошая и интересная, но получится ли разработчикам все же вывести на современный уровень эту игру. 
Хочется поддержать своим отзывом разработчиков, пожелать им удачи. 
Быть может когда-то это действительно станет игрой и можно будет смело звать народ. 
В игре есть баги, это понятно, с блогом разработки вообще ничего не ясно, вроде обновлено описание к игре, но пока нет ничего.
Ждём и свято верим в лучшее.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123122892', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4923, 'last_played': 1608854721}
review: The game has a good concept and is very promising. I wish it was updated more often and it is in need of new players, or any in fact. Me and a few friends had an awesome base with a large shipyard and some turrets, but we just abandoned the game since there were no more conflicts, which is what made the game fun. I hope whoever looks at this review will get the game and enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044006907', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1462149079}
review: Este juego fue la gran promesa en la epoca de los survivals en 2016. Prometia muchas cosas, el crafteo era parecido a rust, pero casi no encontrabas nada de recursos. Lo compré desde que salió,  le dedique unas horas y en un principio lucía prometedor. Creo que el desarrollador usó el dinero generado para putear y usar drogas porque mas nunca le puso la mano. Un juego hoy en dia muerto, lleno de bugas y con graficos de hace 10 años. Una pena. Prometia ser el Seaworld online.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189613193', 'num_games_owned': 649, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1259, 'last_played': 1709404533}
review:
Die Atmosphäre im Spiel ist für mich einfach nur geil. Überwiegend Wasser, mit vielen Felsigen Inseln, wo Loot zu finden ist. Zu Anfangs mit einer Art Motorisierten Palette, später mit einem Jetsky ist man unterwegs um Zeugs zu sammeln. Bisher habe Ich 3-4 verschiedene Loothaufen entdeckt: "Holzhaufen, Holzstamm, Metallhaufen und Müllhaufen". Öl kann man bei den Bohrinseln bekommen, 4 Stück auf der Map verteilt. Als Narung findet man Fische, Muscheln (manchmal auch an Land) und Haie im Wasser, letzteres stellt auch die momentan einzige Gefahr im Spiel dar. Durch den einsatz eines Taucheranzugs kann man dann später auch im Wasser looten. Es dauert eine Weile bis man mal in der Lage ist das Spiel richtig funktionell auszukosten, zumindest das was es momentan gibt. Das Spiel war einige Zeit durch mangelnde Finanzielle mittel lahmgelegt, weshalb es immernoch in einer art "Bugged-Alpha" (soll wohl heisen, das es sich hier noch um einer sehr frühe Alpha handelt) ist. Die Grafik und Darstellung ist meiner meinung sehr gut für diese Entwicklungsstufe. Was jedoch garnicht ok ist sind zum Größtenteil die Sounds, aber Ich bin da sehr zuversichtlich. Ein Dedicated Server ist ganz Easy zu erstellen, was wiederum sehr geil ist. Dieser kann dann sofort In-Game gefunden werden.

Ich kenne schon einige Spiele in dieser machart (Siehe meine Spiele-Liste) und "Hide und Hold out - H2o" ist da auf sehr hohem nievau, nur hingt die entwicklung der Zeit hinterher. Die Idee des Spiels ist absolut geil und Ich hoffe das es der Entwickler schafft und vorallem einsieht, das er hilfe und vorallem einen Publisher bzw. Sponsor braucht. Es ist noch nicht zu Spät. Die schlechten Bewertungen die das Spiel bereits erhalten hat, beinhalten alle, das es ein sehr gutes Spiel sein kann, wenn es dann endlich weitergeht. Also haut rein Leute, Ihr habt hier ein echt geilen Titel, lasst in nicht sterben ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198307606794', 'num_games_owned': 1741, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 2167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2157, 'last_played': 1527290034}
review: While this game has a great "WaterWorld" survival concept, the only challenging AIs (at current, in the game) are sharks and it would be far more interesting to deal with pirates, traders, & other survivor AIs. To me this game isn't "whole" with just a PVP idea...there's hundreds of those floating around and only about 5% of them are worth playing so this game needs to get it in gear and develop some new AIs to deal with or just give it up. I've had the game for half a year and seen no "noticeable" improvments worth mentioning. And i hope they don't make the same mistake (that 7 days to die did) by thinking better equates to "harder to play" because it doesn't.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031005498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1499550327}
review: Ich habe noch nicht so viel gespielt deswegen folgt vielleicht in den nächsten Tagen oder Wochen noch ein edit zum review. Habe jetzt erstmal fast 2 Stunden gespielt und mir ein kleines häusschen gebaut und die Inseln erforscht das Spiel macht mir sehr spaß da es etwas von dem Film Waterworld hat und mal etwas neues ist. Ich habe es im Sale gekauft. Kann das spiel nur empfehlen. Also kommen wir mal zu den guten dingen am spiel ich finde es sehr atmosphärisch und es hat irgendwie etwas spezielles finde das crafting menü sehr übersichtlich und einfach zu bedienen. Man findet viele Sachen auf den Inseln. Negativ finde ich das die Performance ab und zu nicht so gut ist doch dies kann auch an den Servern liegen. Alles in allem ein sehr gutes spiel an dem doch noch etwas gearbeitet werden muss. Ich hoffe die entwickler stecken ihr herzblut in das Projekt dann könnte das spiel echt gut werden. Leider spielen auch zu wenig leute das spiel. Und man darf auch wie bei jedem early acces spiel nicht vergessen das es immer alpha oder beta versionen sind an denen dauerhaft noch gearbeitet wird. Ich kann das game einfach nur empfehlen grade jetzt wo das ganze spiel komplett überarbeitet wurde.

review:
This game PHYSICALLY hurt my PC!

I dont know how exactly but it made my PC go into solid freeze every time i played it for 10 Minutes, only hard reset was left to do. Since that it now makes a crackling sound whenever I turn it on...

I sent a message with a dxdiag to the dev. but no answer... 

If you buy this, make sure you backup your important files first!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014944156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1233, 'last_played': 1498101364}
review:
This game was super interesting on launch. Had a blast in the PvP scene, when the servers weren't freaking out. There of course were bugs, but the game was fun.

Then came the cheaters. No anti-cheat destroyed the real community of the game.

Hoping people will give this game another chance. It's an awesome setting. Primitive in content at the moment, but hell, what do people do in sandboxy survival games anyhow? - pvp and raid.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989751093', 'num_games_owned': 1470, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1497219775}
review:
Игроков нет, багов куча, возможностей в игре - всего ничего.

Крафтил полчаса самолёт - он провалился под воду и завис, при перезаходе на сервер просто исчез.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284715797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1732, 'last_played': 1532107966}
review: Very miss judged game, yes it is in Early Access but after a couple of updates here an there it is actually becoming a very interesting game, if your the kind of person who likes survival and base building games mixed with islands and a whole load of water then this is the game for you! Materials are scarce and the shark don't give up without a fight, overall I would recommend this game to anyone of all ages, just watch out for the sharks and the sudden explosions of makeshift crafts!

author: {'steamid': '76561198173721090', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2734, 'last_played': 1496789052}
review:
I have had this game since it's release and it has definitely had its fair share of bugs and cheaters. Recently the Dev released an update to get rid of the cheaters within the game and so far the results have been amazing. The game UI has been completely revamped and the whole game was converted to server side.

I am super excited for the potential this game has and I really hope that people start becoming active because the Dev is active and there are huge plans for this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221688064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2360, 'last_played': 1501932584}
review:
[English version below]

H2O est un jeu avec énormément de potentiel! Il a connu des débuts difficiles en raison des cheaters qui avaient dominé les serveurs, mais la dernière mise à jour a permis de résoudre ce problème. La seule chose qui manque désormais au jeu, c'est davantage de joueurs motivés pour pouvoir s'amuser, échanger, combattre, ... Et je suis quasiment sûre que très prochainement cela arrivera, et le jeu aura toutes les clefs en main pour évoluer davantage et devenir un jeu complet, avec plus d'options et de possibilités. Le développeur est très réactif et impliqué envers les joueurs, il prend en compte toutes leurs demandes et/ou suggestions pour rendre le jeu encore plus intéressant et agréable. Et c'est un énorme point fort qu'à H2O! Il reste encore quelques bugs, mais rien de vraiment handicapant, et ils seront corrigés au cours des prochains jours avec les patchs additionnels. Bref, je reccommande vraiment ce jeu! Je sais que beaucoup de personnes croient encore en H2O, et ils ont totalement raison! :-)

H2O is a game which have a HUGE potential! At the beginning, the game was hampered by some cheating players that dominated all the servers, but this issue have been fixed during the last update. The only thing that is now missing is some motivated players to have a good time on the game: exchange, help each other, and obviously... fight! I'm pretty sure that all these things will come soon, and it will allow H2O to progress towards  a game with more options and more abilities. But the main strong point of this game is the involvement and the reactivity of the developer, that considers all the requests and/or suggestions of the players in order to make the game even more enjoyable! There are still little bugs in this version of H2O, but nothing really annoying, and it will be fixed in the next few days with some additionnal patches. So, I recommend strongly this game! I know that a lot of people still believe in H2O, and they're completely right! :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198070620940', 'num_games_owned': 639, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1497392357}
review: Oyun aslında bitmemiş bir oyun gibi. Arayüzü iğrenç, loot kaynakları çok zayıf. Tabi en büyük sürprizi de inanılmaz bugları. Düşünün ki ben yaklaşık 4 saatimi bu oyuna vermişim kardeşim ve arkadaşımla beraber, iyi kötü bir iskele ve 2 tane jetski yapmışız kapısı kilitli bir iskele bu, sabah bir bakıyorsunuz jetski yerinde yok acaba neden? kapalı olan bir iskeleden sizin uğraş vererek yaptığınız itemi bug yaparak çalıyorlar. Onca vakit boşa gidiyor oyunu iade edeyim diyorsunuz bu sefer steam efendi iade alamayız diyor. Almayın aldırtmayın çok pişman olursunuz. Mobil oyunlarda bile bu oyundan daha iyi grafik var ayrıca onu da bilmelisiniz. Değil indirimde 16 lira bu oyunu bedava verseler bile indirme tenezzülüne girmemek lazım.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255551896', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1824, 'last_played': 1527666650}
review:
Оригинальная задумка игры, аналогов я так на неё и не видел.
Приятная графика, сильно нетребовательная, так же не плохая оптимизация.
Недавно вышло глобальное обновление, где изминили интерфейс и карту.
На счёт карты: она уже не такая сырая как была в самом начале открытия игры, на ней находятся различные рт (различные строения и места спавна лута).
Так же мне понравился режим строительства в игре, конечно немного хардкорный но прикольный
Не совсем редко выходят обновления не только с фиксами но так же и с добавлением новых предметов и измением карты.
Конечно онлайн будет маловат, НО САМОЕ ГЛАВНОЕ ЧТО РАЗРАБОТЧИКИ НЕ ПОЛОЖИЛИ РЖАВАЙ БОЛТ НА ИГРУ.

The original idea of ​​the game, I have never seen it in analogues.
Nice graphics, very undemanding, just not a bad optimization.
Recently there was a global update, where the interface and the card were deleted.
At the expense of the card: it is no longer as raw as it was at the very beginning of the opening of the game, on it are various rt (different buildings and spawn loot places).
I also liked the mode of construction in the game, of course a bit hardcore but cool
Not infrequently there are updates not only with fixes but also with the addition of new items and changing the map.
Of course, online will be small, BUT THE MOST IMPORTANT THAT THE DEVELOPERS HAVE NOT POSIED RIVING THE BOLT ON THE GAME.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047331031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3879, 'last_played': 1668481166}
review:
This game has potential like nobodies business. The only problem is the population. It was great fun when it first started and people were everywhere. Then they got scared away and are too stubborn to say they will try again when the time comes. The developer (only one now) is working on the game and knows this game only gets awesome with a lot of people playing, so he is trying to get there.

EDIT 6/2/17: The game has been updated and it is very stable now. No funny business yet in terms of hackers and the team is hard at work fixing what little bugs we can find. The dedication is there, we have seen like 3 small updates so far since the return.

Once you get a jetski its a whole new game. Get some friends and control one of the four oil rigs, a loot town, or a nice cove away from the madness. Other/new modes are also set to come out in the future.

This game shines with a healthy population and a full server so please get it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255025531', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1472600621}
review:
I got this game for free to test it for the developers. When I first got it, I knew it was in an extremely early state and was fine with the way the game was going. Updates here and there. But then all of the sudden, no updates ever. The dev will not respond to me.
Bottom Line: Do not purchase this game

UPDATE: After seeing new update coming soon and hearing of a complete recoding, I will leave my review as not recommending but If these promises come true, I will change

author: {'steamid': '76561198011769273', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2059, 'last_played': 1521856237}
review:
This game has great potential, especially for fans of Waterworld. I did very much enjoy the hours I sank into it until the inevitable lack of content (which is fine) at this time got too repetitive. 

However, the developer needs to seriously sort his priorities out. He is providing a product to paying customers (for a rather high price of $17.99USD considering) and needs to stop acting like this is that five year old project you have rusting away in your shed. People have paid money for this game with the expecation that development will continue. We are not asking for you to finish it today, tommorow or even anytime in the near future. But what we EXPECT is a good line of communication where you keep us up to date on what is happening rather than the current weeks, months with no communication and then occasionally dropping in and blaming it on your internet...seriously.

All in all I wouldn't waste my money until the developer sorts his stuff out. Steam needs to stop allowing these cashgrab and runs, games that have been adbandoned should be removed from the store (ie the developer must do weekly/monthly check ins for early access games).

***EDIT (08MAR17): Developer seems to have made some progress with some re-coding and seems to have some good plans in store. Progress seems to have began again and we are being informed. I'll revisit the review again soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132525821', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3479, 'last_played': 1499005406}
review:
This game is alot of fun! I played it so much with my friends.
In the time I played it the admins would listen to your requests and they where very nice to you.
I asked them why they didn't come online to play with their community and they said we can't
cause we want to make the game better for the community.

The community is awesome! Made lots of friends to play with.
Ofcourse the game is not the best, but thats why its a alpha.
It looks like the makers of the game are working on it 24/7

https://trello.com/b/kDBzUl9h/hide-hold-out-h2o-dev

I would recommend this game, but you should wait with buying it.
The game has only 3 - 10 people online a day, on different servers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076192588', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1485851910}
review:
Um ótimo jogo de sobrevivencia em alto mar! sim o lugar que nos é fornecido para tentar sobreviver são pequenas ilhas ! então é necessário criar nossa moradia a beira do mar e sem dúvida começar a construção de um bote  e posteriormente pequenos barcos! A proposta do jogo é interessante e inovadora considerando sobrevivencia na agua , o gráfico é bonito mas longe de ser moderno! jogabilidade simples e intuitiva , base player ainda é muito pequena  infelizmente, mas o jogo está sempre tendo updates , claramente ficarei de olho no futuro deste jogo.

review em Inglês :

A great survival game on the high seas ! yes the place that we are given to try to survive are small islands ! then we need to create our house by the sea and no doubt start building a boat and later small boats ! The purpose of the game is interesting and innovative considering survival in the water , the chart is beautiful but far from modern! simple and intuitive gameplay, player base is still too small unfortunately , but the game is always having updates, clearly I will be looking at the future of this game .

author: {'steamid': '76561198128515147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1470694204}
review: 游戏与宣传图有很大的区别,画面开到最高也不比CS1.6高得了多少. 游戏概念是挺不错的，但是这么大的一片海洋很容易让人逛着逛着就觉得蛋疼。"为什么要玩下去?" 是我开游戏到退游戏的这短短几分钟内最想说的话，Unity引擎虽然说不上有多好，但是起码做一款21世纪生存游戏是绰绰有余的，开发者在环境优化这里做的非常烂尾。再来说一下游戏的服务器，官服有5个左右，全部0-2人。私服一大半，大部分0人。 这个游戏能继续在Steam出售也是让我觉得很神奇，建议开发者先下架游戏，全面修改后再上市吧。买了退款很没意思，但是我必须这样做，毕竟20美元来买这个半成品是绝对不值得的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032523005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 38759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35564, 'last_played': 1496785042}
review:
Завис более чем на 400 часов в игре...
Крафт, адреналин и атмосфера затянули. Прекрасная идея и реализация.  
Много интересных секретиков , которые ну никак не будут доступны вам за пару часов теста))
Почти каждый месяц что то добавляется. 
**да ждём патча с сентября , но разраб отчитывается - пишет , что мутит что-то глобальное..
Игра сделана качественно! Надеюсь решат вопрос лагов при строительстве огромных баз.
Акулы давно уже не летают.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057999123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1469973056}
review:
Nach 5 minuten in dem Spiel habe ich folgende sachliche kretikpunkte ebenfalls erkläre ich wieso ich nur 5 minuten Spielzeit habe den jeder der mehr hat sollte sich mal untersuchen lassen
-Pflanzen also die paar die es gibt fliegen 5 Meter über dem Boden
- Heute waren um 16 uhr 8 spieler auf allen Servern zusammen online dazu muss man sagen es sind sommerferien und es ist sonntag Mittag
-Die Grafik ist sehr sehr schlecht
-Das abbauen der rohstoffe ist schlecht umgesetzt
-Das Menu zum craften usw ist trist in einem hässlichen weiss ton
- abbau geräte und tools sind sehr schlecht dargestellt

-Das zum Contra pro ist Wasserfahrzeuge und Flugzeuge

author: {'steamid': '76561198172068491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3803, 'last_played': 1648321688}
review:
As of Sept 30th 2018 - Several months ago the dev stated he was working on the game again.  Its been months with no further word from him what-so-ever.  It seems like he was just trying to con people into buying the game.  No salt here, it would have been a good game.  To bad.

DONT BUY.

Old Review:

The concept of this game is amazing!  Its a fun and unique take on on survival and base building game and I hope that it someday becomes what it was intended to be; however, it has serious work that needs to be done.  On a constant basis one or more of the 5 offical servers is down - and lets face it, no one wants to be on multiple servers working for hours on end just to get to the level you were at on the other server.  These servers will sometimes stay offline for days and give no warning of going offline.  Secondly, hackers are a serious issue in this game (as hacks are easily available for the layman online).  Like most games in alpha this game has its fair share of bugs - boats or planes easily get stuck and cannot be removed (time consuming to replace), characters glitch and can become invisible while their physical character sits idle somewhere else on the map.  Additionally, this game is only being done by two devs and a team of 3 moderators (who I have yet to see on or recieve a response from) - don't expect a response from a team that is either super busy or has lost interest in the project.

The last thing I will say is this: don't expect to be online with more than litterally 3-5 other people at one time.  With all the hours that I have put in on two offical servers, I have spent only 6 hours or so online with someone else.  Gets kinda lonely and boring.

Take home message: wait until this game starts getting a lot of improvements.  Look online from time to time and see if guides / hints and tips are out.  That may be your first indication.  Goodluck!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014165146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2752, 'last_played': 1482170773}
review:
Hello Fellow SURVIVORS!!!!!!

Hide and Hold Out - H2o What is it you may ask>? is it like rust? is it like all the other "genre type" games out there nowadays??????

Well here is my take on it, 

First off - Dev team this is to you, A fist bump and a super high five to both of you! (only 2 guys are making this fyi) 

I have a list of games that goes on and on  with the survival you start with nothing and craft, build and repeat style gameplay examples:  rust, miscreated, arma z, ark, ect ect ect............. 

this game mixes the best of all the games that have been out and adds a super twist to the gameplay.

think: waterworld meets rust for the older crowd for the younger survivor out there think rust meets borderlands with the majority of the map covered in water.

you may think this is a disadvantage for the player but believe me its not, this makes the small amount of land VERY valuable and this game makes the play own an area decent enough to not allow others to build up and in to your base, lots of great new content on the way and this game is fully functionable, obviously some glitches happen now and again it is very new. but the devs put alot of effort into making this game meaty with hours and hours of fun.

I highly recommend this game to all my friends and fellow survivors out there, just think of the hours you have spent in other games that didnt amount to much pvp or constant thrills, this game offers content for all types of players come take a look the best 18 bucks you can spend on a game.


LuckyCharms

author: {'steamid': '76561197964938032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2245, 'last_played': 1482042142}
review:
After being an avid player in Rust.... TIll Ark Took over my life and I still think ark is an amazing game but once I got into H2o I was Hooked Here are some of the things I like about the H2o compared to my past experience with other survival FPS' that might Apeal to the average gamer.

GAMEPLAY IS BUTTER SMOOTH compared to any other Survival Game Ive played. I run an older but still powerful R9270X Iv always played my games for performance over Graphic quality pertaining to settings no matter what game I run Ill turn it up till i see if effect my fps then Ill turn it down a touch further so I dont lose any frames I rock a constant 150 On high graphics compared to arks 60 on the lowest settings.

Development LUDICRIS QUICK! Ill tell you what the developers of this game must be robots because it seems like these guys are constantly updatinng the game or talking with players and server owners on their devlopment page. Alot of Updates have included Player Ideas and have been successful in game in my experience. 

The physics are getting tweeked and perfected but Im telling you the 2 Primary Developers in this game Get more work done in a week than the ark or rust developers might be able to get done on a GOOD MONTH....

That being said there are still bugs... IT is still in development............. You will lose things and possibly have to start over in the future due to updates. 

The Transportation in this game is Really awesome and something Ark could not or would not do.
The Fuel Economy and Base building is really Spot on along with the Harvesting resources. 
Crafting is Fun and Detailed yet alot more simple than Ive seen in other games.
Electrical system is Unique!
The Underwater Play is also Great.

If you Purchasing the Game as  EARLY ACCESS "STILL IN DEVEOPMENT"  and expect anything more or are unable to handel this without giving a RAGEVIEW then Wait till you grow up a little bit and can put on your big boy pants. Don't just  go and cut this amazing game down because your to Stupid to understand the concept of EARLY ACCESS "Still in development and lost all your shit due to an update.

But if you can handel it

Be ready to Enjoy a Great game that still fairly early in development but still compleatly functional and playable and Join us on the Quest to Final Release its going to be a Exciting Journey.

~LEAF|Estakin

Come Play!

SERVER:
(US Central) WATER WONDERLAND

author: {'steamid': '76561198209428096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2265, 'last_played': 1474512910}
review:
Hide and Hold Out is Rust type game mixed with a post apocalyptic water world environment. Just purely with the emphasis of starting with vehicle makes it much better than rust having to walk everywhere. It has alot of end game goals with the different shipyards to build boats, helis, and planes. The feature of electricity seems really cool although due to heavy resource collecting I haven't reached the abi;ity to use this feature yet. The main aspect of really enjoying the game is finding a good PvE server where you do not have to worry about raiding or dying by other players. Base building is very similar to rust with different tiers of walls,doors,windows etc. (5.6 hours of gameplay)

13.5 hour review
Flying vehicles like recon helicopter are essential for spotting magnetic boxes, garbage, and other items also is really fast to get around. Slight learning curve to handling the heli and be careful to not to eject yourself by pressing e. Trading is pretty cool aspect if you get a good lobby. Electricity is pretty cool though some things are learned like how to place turbines has to be a spot without a floor. Use jet skis to farm oil as its one of the fastest vehicles in game. 


Game 12/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197996205793', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1467148606}
review:
Üzerinde daha çok çalışılması gererekiyor 

Sularla kaplı bir dünya yiyecek bulmak başlı başına sıkıntıyken birde suda yüzen köpek balıklarına yem olmamaya çalışıyorsunuz. Etrafda bulunan scrapları kazma yardımı ile toplayıp içinden çıkan materyallerle (iron, steel, wood gibi) crat yapıyoruz. Oyuna başlayanalara tavsiye ilk yapacağınız şey bir base olsun çünkü sürekli suya girmek zorunda kalabilirsiniz ve suya girdiğinizde köpek balıkları hızlı bir şekilde sizi parçalıyorlar ve tekrar başladığınzda üzerinizde hiç bir şey olmuyor topladığınız her şey gidiyor. Oyunun gelişimini merak ediyorum bir şey söylemek için çok erken gibi çünkü şuan için serverler boş, Offical olarak EU serverları dahi yok. Oyunla ilgili son olarak mümkün olduğunca gece su da bulunmayın elinizdeki el fenerine güvenmeyin çünkü o fener 20 cm den fazlasını aydınlatmıyor ve o karanlıkta suya düşerseniz kesinlkle botunuzu kaybedip köpek balıklarına yem olursunuz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126382801', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1485689323}
review:
Thanks to game developers for chance to get this game earlier than it was released and test it out.

So if you are looking at reviews you problably expect a review that will definetely help you decide wheter buy or pass this game. If you need quick opinion - buy it! If you want more detailed, keep reading.



So you are survivor that somehow got to islands and survived (something). Game has some Rust-like things but it doesn't make it bad. It has great graphics that, i think, some cheap laptops would run smoothly. Game is definetely CPU intensive and less GPU intensive but i still suggest both components great cause they mean a lot for fps.  

So  here we go

Pros :
*Fun gameplay with friends
*Great game idea 
*Descent graphics for today.
*You don't really need beast pc to run it but it doesn't mean that it supports "potatoes" :D
*I really like survival games

Cons :
*Weird stutter when slowly walking forward, may be my specs and may be the game
*Little unbalanced weapons, they are hard to get and they are OP, sounds good but doesn't turn out that well.
*Slow development


I give it solid 5/10.

[h1] So it's been 2 years since i own the game [/h1]

Had to make seperate section for this so i can conclude what happened.

The game was very alive and i could call it literally modded Rust, just on water. Community was twindling and everyone played it.

Then many realised that developers aren't pushing out as much updates as games need. It was slow and painful due to many bugs ingame which got people leaving it.

Devs announce issues with development which makes them stop game development completely, also shut down official servers. Players left the game and it was pretty much dead. Hardly anybody was to be found on servers.

Now developers are continuing to work on the game again and as i see, servers are live again so that problem is solved.

[b] but [/b] 

Community has been hit hard with slow progress of game and many problems which really impacts the playerbase and therefore i will have to let You know to be very careful deciding wether this game is buyable or not, not many are playing it anymore.

It still has potential to be great game, it has good content and can be great time grab.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130472173', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1496566225}
review:
В общем данный продукт очень приятный, мало где можно найти игру на выживание в данной тематике, ведь выживание на воде это круто, игра сыровата но забавна и сюда будут вводить все больше интересного контента. Так же по моему имееться небольшая доля атмосферы из Раста Legacy.
Плюсы:
1. Уникальность.
2. Сама карта интересна.
3. Система рейдов тоже уникальна.
4. Интересная система кланов.
5. Различие техники.
6. Подводная живность
Минусы:
1. Сыроватость (но это исправляют)
2. Малый онлайн, но это со временем надеюсь исправят.
3. Баги имеються, но и это все фиксят
В общем игра достойная, всем совеую

review:
Rust Legacy во вселенной Водного Мира.

- Апдейты иногда реже чем раз в месяц.

author: {'steamid': '76561198181488195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7725, 'last_played': 1501061079}
review:
Good game!   Great Concept!   Work still needed.   There is potential for this game!   All the negative comments with no explanation why are wasted time.   This game does have issues.  PLAIN AND SIMPLE THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!   If you are someone who wants perfection right off the hop then put the game on follow and watch the development status first before purchasing!   Now if you want to play the game is it develops so you can experience the changes and be part of the development (Trust me you will be part of it with your bug reports as you come across them) then this game is worth it.

Update 2017-06-08
Devs are pumping out fixes and updates on a regular basis now.   Game is picking up again.   Again as previously stated before though this game is still in the process of being developed!  There are gopnna be bugs!  There are gonna be issues!   There are gonna be flaws!  Just do not complain about it, report any and all bugs you come across so that they can be fixed and this game will become a damn good game!  Not saying it isnt a damn good game now but it could be 100x more damn good!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198075549714', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1068, 'last_played': 1504708135}
review:
Я не нашел полезных обзоров от русских ребят. Вот мой адекватный обзор
Конечно в первую очередь об оптимизации! Меня удовлетворила на моей системе : 
i7 860 2.8 Ghz
4 Gb ОЗУ 1600 Ghz
GTX 750 Ti 2048 mb ~1150 GHz
На разрешении 1680*1050 игра показывает 125 FPS в Ultra настройках. 
Графика для игры такого жанра 4\5
Система крафта 4\5 (много крафта, но сложная и не продумана)
Игра продумана до мелочей (как показалось мне) , на мото-плоте даже прорисована анимация вращения ремня привода двигателя! Кому это важно тот поймет меня.
По моим оценкам игра на 8\10 баллов. Эдакий Раст на воде, давно ждал такую игру.
Игра новая и игроков мало, поэтому сразу зовите друзей, в одного играть не выйдет!
Ну и самое главное!!! Игра очень быстро и стремительно растет и спасибо за это разработчикам!!!
Если вам принес пользу мой отзыв ставьте "Палец вверх" , для меня это важно
Советую к покупке!

author: {'steamid': '76561197964353001', 'num_games_owned': 834, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1476021344}
review:
Hide & Hold Out (H2O) is promising a lot of very interesting gameplay (at least for those interested in survival/post apocaliptic/water world settings). 
You strand on a set of islands on which you should survive by scavenging and building your base. It appears (at the moment) to be PVP only. If PvE is planned, I am not aware.

The devs appear to work on it rather frequently on it (at least in the last couple of weeks and month).

Its one of the games where I wish an option between "yes" and "no" for a recommendation is possible. It is not really a "no", but not really a "yes" either.
There isn't a "in between". So I am forced to decide.

There are still quite a lot of issues to deal with before I'd personally consider it pre-Beta or post-Alpha.
I might be just unlucky (as there are actually people playing it and apparently with a lot of fun), but I still experience rather plenty of lags, cheaters (even though that good better), glitches in graphics and gameplay, the occasionally disconnect and some headaches around the UI.

Personally I think the game was thrown out to Early Access a little too early. However, I am more than happy to change to a "yes" more down the road after a handful of (bigger) patches...and after seeing there it will be going.

Early Access is what it is...unfinished, unpolished games which we are being able to purchase to support the devs financially and with testing.
In this particular case I am just not sure if the game is a few patches short of being just stable enough for EA.

Therefore at the moment, its a "do not buy yet, unless you are really, really willing to support and wait for more patches".

author: {'steamid': '76561198047222750', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1463857085}
review:
Hier gibt es ein paar Videos aus unserer Angezockt-Reihe zum Titel Hide & Hold Out H2o.
Die erste Folge verlinke ich hier überhalb meines Reviews:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xZZuct303Yo

Eigentlich ein sehr interessantes PVP Survivalgame mit Crafting Elementen.
Gerade sich in einer Gruppe zusammen zu tun und mit vereinten Kräften eine
Festung aufzubauen und Jagd auf andere Gruppen und Spiele zu machen, das
macht schon unglaublich viel Spaß. Das Crafting System ist einfach zu verstehen,
lediglich die Suche nach dem passenden Material ist teilweise schwerer als gedacht.

Momentan wirkt die Spielwelt noch sehr leer und leblos. Die meisten Inseln wirken wie 
vorgefertigte Bausteine aus einem Leveleditor. Ein paar Eyecatcher wären da für die Grafik
definitig wünschenswert. Leider ist das Spiel auch noch etwas verbugt (schlechtes Treffer-
Feedback, fehlerhafte Kollisonsabfrage) und der eine oder andere Hacker ist uns leider auch
schon über den Weg gelaufen. 
Ich würde erst auf ein paar Updates warten und sobald das Spiel aus dem Early Access kommt
nochmal reinschauen und euch einen neuen Review schreiben / schneiden.

review:

My largest complaints are only the snap aligments need to actually snap and not just show green when its close ...  cause the aligments get out of whack after you place a level or two then cant figure why pieces wont snap.. author: {'steamid': '76561198295349537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 20461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6936, 'last_played': 1531673334}
review:
overall a great game with a lot of potential, very fun most moments, suprising graphics and immersion despite its low price. flying is a little tricky to start, but is easy to get the hang of, but overall, a grade B+ time killer. i do hope it gets better and grows as time goes on. great builder but needs a little work on the combat. i would still definately recommend.


pros:

+this is a great building game, similar to minecraft, with much better graphics and mechanics
+++humorous game mechanics, i love blowtorching whale/shark carcasses for resources
++awesome vehicles both in appearance and performance
+++++flying sharks
+++jet ski jousting
++piloting capital ships is fun with a team
++decent combat when populated
+++shooting stuff with cannon
+scavenging for survival
++game allows for funny/artisic building projects once acclimated with the build system

cons (mostly small stuff):

-low population (hope more people start to play)
-quickly stale pve (needs more monsters and maybe horde spawner/random event generator)
-cannot retrieve clothing from your corpse after death unlike other items in inventory
-not much to do other than build after the objective of sustaining needs are met
-cannot retrieve harpoons after they are thrown
-needs more furniture and decor to build
-if heavy builder, must grind resource gathering simulator heavily, burning copious amounts of time
-not enough stuff to shoot with cannon
-piloting capital ships can be tricky when solo
--fixing the flying shark bug. lol

author: {'steamid': '76561197968557357', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1464893929}
review:
-Pros
*Gives that "rust at launch" feeling.
*Waterworld type premesis is more interesting than the other dayz/rust clones offer.
*Fair amount of stuff in underwater, giving you a new way to explore.


-Cons
*Hackers, Hackers as far as the eye can see. This game runs on Unity which has boatloads and boatloads of hackers, both figuritively, and litterally.
*Advertised Battle mode is not in game, which was a main buying point for me.
*Virtually no game population. I saw a peak of 8 players on the most populated official server. Theres 30+ servers, and maybe 12 players online in the whole game.
*Many exploits and bugs that happened in H20 are indentical to ones in Rust at launch.

Verdict : I want to play this game, I really do! But the same reason I left Rust, H1Z1, Aftermath, and such games remains. There is no effective anti-cheat, and it looks very much like this game will be plagued by hackers for its lifetime.

*Note - As of this writing, Hackers can do the following, Spawn any items, Instant kill whole server, teleport to players, and ESP. Furthermore, according to offsite game forums, you can use cracked versions of the game to play online, grant yourself admin powers, and disable showing your steamID. Bans have no effect, as hackers can just generate themselves a new fake ID to continue playing.

review:
Ну вот пришло время и этой игры для моего обозревания.
Не могу сказать, что игра мне не понравилась или я от нее восторге, нового в этой игре мало если не считать попытку воссоздать атмосферу фильма "Водный мир". Баги имеются - а где их в раннем доступе нет? Тем более, что игра вышла еще совсем недавно, а не тусуется на прилавках Steam уже около двух лет и стоит вполне себе адекватную цену.
Но если вам не хочется платить, но хочется посмотреть что это за игра - милости прошу посмотреть видеообзор на эту игру.
Всем спокойной воды!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U-jzm9OqCWg

author: {'steamid': '76561197965339895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 999, 'last_played': 1497991188}
review: Играл недолго, и это мой первый пожалуй отзыв к игре. Игра имеет потенциал хоть и отзывы разнятся, на начальном этапе имела серьёзные проблемы которые не давали нормально и комфортно играть, но далее разработчики постарались и все стало намного комфортно, но далеко от идеала, так как она находится в раннем альфа тестирование. Вид от первого лица тут намного приятней и не создает впечатления клаустрофобии или других подобных симптомов, тут также есть вид от третьего лица когда используешь транспорт любой. Я думаю что в будущем вид от третьего лица для всего добавят и доработают все ошибки, разработчики очень активные и стараются все это исправить. Модельки персонажей тут немного не очень хорошие, но все же не самые убогие как в других подобных играх по жанру выживания. Сама по себе идея игры о выживание в водном мире создает впечатления чего то нового и необычного. Народу на серверах не так много как хотелось бы, но вот в чем прикол, тут вы откроете для себя огромный выбор для строительства, ощущение спокойствия, и конечно разнообразные пейзажи водного мира. В общем и целом, рекомендую к приобретению.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086209045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1477844598}

author: {'steamid': '76561197980259581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3825, 'last_played': 1582745095}
review:
The game is kind of like RUST with a Waterworld element but with much more to it. There are planes and helicopters to build as well as hover crafts,jet skis, gunboats and cargo ships. Whats not to like about that ?

This game has a lot of potential and with a lot of fun features. The devs have been very good with product updates and support unlike some other early access titles out there. 

Sure there were problems upon initial release but even AAA titles are know for that.

This game needs to get some love from the gaming community to help give this game some of the hype it deserves. That would help to boost the server populations as the game is still a relativley unkown to most of the survival gamers out there.

review:
20/11/2018 DEVELOPEMENT TOUJOURS STOPPE:

Mouais, la reprise du dévelopement n'aura pas durée bien longtemps hein(1 maj)!
Bref, fuyez pauvres fous, vous êtes partit trop loin la, à éviter comme le cancer!!!


19/10/2017 DEVELOPEMENT A L'ARRET COMPLET:

http://store.steampowered.com/news/externalpost/steam_community_announcements/2127244445194479718    

HONTEUX!!!

Alors? je ne vous avais pas prévenu? Arret du developement casi total avant mème de tenir ses promesses!!! Quel bande de pigeons que nous sommes j'te jure, en plus des devs FR qui avaient pris le melon, mais si on peut appeler sa des "devs", vous faites honte au developement vidéo ludique francais Mr les devs!
Et maintenant sa ose se plaindre de bugs non corrigés depuis un an, se plaindre des cheaters qui ne se font absolument pas ban... Conseil, lire les commentaires avant d'acheter!


20/04/2017                  ATTENTION CHEATER H24 EN ACTION!!!

Domage, encors une early acces qui n'à servie qu'à faire du fric et qui ne sortira jamais en final version, petite info: Mr le developeur s'est baré avec la caisse et ne reviendra pas, donc arretez de révé sur un anti-cheat ou du contenu futur qui n'arrivera jamais, rappeler vous des promesses faites en 2016... Toujour rien, nada, le néan donc encore un dev qui nous chie à la gueule...

Quand je pense qu'au final, un copier coller d'asset gratuit unity se vendent à prix d'or comme l'on fait reign of king mais WTF les gars, reveillez vous et arreté de green-ligthé des merdes pareil svp! Cela fera du bien au shop de steam serieu...

A cet instant le jeu n'est que tres peu travaillé, dévopé, donc abandoné pour cause de devs qui ne travail absolument pas ou plus sur le jeu depuis longtemps, de l'amateurisme complet, tiens cela me rappel astrooner qui nous la fait à l'envers un peu comme ici avec un beau marketing...

Revenons au jeu en lui mème:
Un rust like sur l'eau, la description s'arrete à une pale copie merdique (escuser moi mais j'ai la haine de ses studio qui bouffe sur notre dos sans jamais tenir leurs promesses, bon apres les bases du jeu sont la, les graphismes ne sont pas très beau... 

Il manque beaucoup pour attiré un réel public deja habitué au jeu survival du genre, il manque beaucoup à faire, se jeu manque de nouveautés et de fraicheur, des bases sous marine et des sous marin aurait tellement ajouter du chalenge au gameplay, mais non il sort une base de jeu, le vends et se barrent 6 mois apres...

Les plus:

-Des vehicules marrants. (textures, equipements etc)
-Electricitée (Pas d'utilité réel, les tourelles ne sont pas automatiques, donc raid off à tout vas)

Les moins:

-Les spawn de ressources sont trèèèès moche...
-Graphismes un peu joli mais pas non plus ouf, prennez rust en low et sa donne du higth quality sur se jeu...
-Les serveurs sont mal optimiser, les commandes sont juste chiantes et la gestion n'en parlons pas,
-On ne peut construire que sur l'eau, domage...

Il y a beaucoup à dire en mal et les defauts sautent à la gueule*, comme rust exp dans ses debuts (°pardonné mon expression). Mais au moins rust on integré le faite que le grand public pouvait modé le jeu à son gout, rust à su écouter sa commu, ici nous en somme treeeees très loin de rust pour ceux qui le comparent!!!

Donc à ne pas acheter à moins que vous aimiez acheter des jeux qui ne terminerons jamais leur developement, si vous aimez cheater ou bien vous retrouvez sur des serveurs entierements vides car perso je n'est vue que sa...

author: {'steamid': '76561198106424630', 'num_games_owned': 384, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1476547584}
review: A truly amazing survival experience.  This game allows you to do so much so early.  It feels like it has a good build system, good gun play, vehicles, aircraft, so much more! DOn't miss out on this just because it didn't get the hype that Hurtworld (which is not even close to as fun) got. Play this now!!!!! Make this the next popular survival! It deserves it! Floating fortresses, jetskis, helicopters, planes, guns, pvp, unique water setting.  This game is an entire package and given the money and time it can be better than rust is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045861848', 'num_games_owned': 496, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 2465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2354, 'last_played': 1659110251}
review:
Allora, dopo 30 ore di gioco molto divertenti e tutte piene di azione il gioco ha iniziato ad avere molti aggiornamenti (non male ma anche male) e una volta che hai tutto c'è un bug che rompe il cazzo, il server deve wippare e cosi sta andando avanti. Per adesso consiglio di non comprarlo perche è veramente pieno di hacker che lo stanno rovinando, prima c'erano 30 player e passa per server adesso il massimo sono 5 player a server. Il gioco in se è veramente studiato bene e molto divertente, ovviamente se siamo un gruppo numeroso perchè ci sono quelle navi che hanno minimo 2 player e massimo 5 oppure 10 e quindi sarebbe ancora più bello giocare in 10 persone e le battaglie sono bellissime. Io cosa consiglio: se siete da soli non compratelo, ma se siete minimo un gruppo di 4 persone compratelo tutti insieme e giocateci, ma fatelo una volta che sarà finito o almeno quasi finito, perchè il sistema anti cheat non funziona e ripeto che gli hacker stanno rovinando il gioco, davvero un peccato. La prima settimana lo avrei consigliato come ho fatto con diversi amici che lo hanno comprato, ma adesso non lo consiglio e l'unica cosa che consiglio è aspettare. Se volete ulteriori aggiornamenti su come sta andando il gioco non esitate ad aggiungermi e fare domande, in modo che una volta sistemato tutto facciamo tutti insieme un bel gruppo per distruggere il mondo :D.

06/10/2017
Il gioco adesso è ancora morto, purtroppo lo sviluppatore non è riuscito a tirare fuori un aggiornamento che avrebbe potuto far tornare la gente, quindi server vuoti.

Posterò altri aggiornamenti tipo questo se necessari c:

author: {'steamid': '76561198137211568', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2912, 'last_played': 1461798924}
review:
Great Game so far. Yes, I have been impacted by the hackers but the Devs and some of the server owners have been working hard to catch and ban as many as possible. The latest anti cheat program is providing a little more protection but more work needs to be done. Thankfully we are not having to wait weeks or even months to get things done, the Devs are putting something out a couple times a week to address problems.

My personal opinion of the game is that it has a ton of potential. The fact that you can easily get into the game, gather resources and make weapons in no time at all says a lot for where the Devs want to take this game. We have already had some battles over teritory and even equipment such as boats and ships. In its vanilla form which is what I would categorize this game to be in its current form sets the stage for bigger things to come. Is it worth the 18.00 spent to see what its like. Definitely!

Find a server where there appears to be a few admins on and play for awhile, of they are doing their job, then you'll see them kick or ban players who are hacking or exploiting game glitches. At the same time also take note if the admins are using their powers to only benefit themselves. 

Or clan [KGB] has two servers up at the moment. The first one (Smoke on the Water) was ok. By that I mean we managed it as best we could without any Anti Cheat associated with the game. We banned quite a few people but at the same time we were hacked just as much. Either everyone was killed on the server or it was a selective kill situation. Although that  server still exists for the time being we will be taking it down completely in a day or two. 

We now have a new server up Called [US] Smokers and Jokers [KGB]. We have at least 4-5 admins currently approved to conduct normal operations, such a update, restarts, kicks, bans and a few other commands. WE do not exploit for our own needs. This is a PvP server so we ill do battle like anyone else. Easy Anti Cheat is active. The server is located in Dallas Tx. I hope more of you are considering buting this game because it really does have the potential to become something big.

Good Luck
Phoenix

author: {'steamid': '76561198084635692', 'num_games_owned': 1762, 'num_reviews': 310, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1461516395}
review:
Hide & Hold Out - это многопользовательский симулятор выживания. Разработчики из Red Abyss Software создали этот проект под явным впечатлениям от фильма Водный мир. Если вы помните этот фильм, то игра вам явно придется по вкусу.

Мир погрузился под воду и, скорее всего, это вина именно человечества. Так как, нескончаемые войны, болезни и прочее "изобретение" человечества и привело планету к столь плачевному состоянию. Теперь Земля состоит на 90% из воды, и горстка людей должны адаптироваться в новых условиях, чтобы выжить. По мере исследования мира мы будем натыкаться на остатки цивилизации, которая теперь покоится под водами океана. Но в H2O нам будут попадаться и маленькие клочки земли, на которых мы можем найти металл или дерево.

По словам разработчиков, в игру будет добавлена канализация, которая будет покоиться также под водой. А вот для того, чтобы найти вход в канализацию, придется найти соответствующие записи, в которых будут координаты входа. По задумке, канализация будет служить неким транспортной сетью, по которой вы сможете попасть на любое место карты, но, как и полагается, такое место будет охраняться, и, скорее всего, там будут либо какие то мутанты, либо же люди, которые отдадут свою жизнь ради защиты своей базы. Для пробития пути сквозь этих тварей, игра может вам предложить крафт различного оружия, начиная от простого колющего-режущего оружия, и заканчивая огнестрельным.

В игре присутствует большое разнообразие крафта начиная от стандартного оружие (типо нож) и заканчивая сложными постройками лифта или целой мобильной базы, которая сможет передвигаться по воде. Вообще, крафт в H2O выглядит очень прилично, тут же и инструменты для добычи пищи, так как это водный мир, то в основном ваша пища - рыба, тут же и транспорт для передвижения, начиная от простой моторной лодки, и заканчивая мобильной артиллерией на воде, также вы сможете построить целый самолет, для бомбардировки противников с воздуха. Для постройки базы есть такие стандартные предметы как: пол, стены, решетки, окна, люки, двери (как для простого входа, так и для вашего наводного гаража), потолок, и даже лифт. В целом вы сможете создать дом вашей мечты. Хотелось бы заметить, что подпитка лифта осуществляется через электрическую сеть. Хоть мы находимся и в водном мире, но морские жители не единственное возможное пропитание нашего персонажа. В H2O предусмотрена мини-ферма, вы сможете выращивать в маленьких резервуарах пшеницу, помидоры и прочую продукцию. 

Что же касается графической составляющей, то для студии состоящих из 2-х человек - это явно нечто потрясающее. Все выглядит довольно реалистично и живо. Хотелось бы отметить, что люди не единственная опасность, которая может вам встретиться в игре. Жители подводного мира, также желают полакомиться вашим мяском. Я говорю об акулах.  Кстати, когда вы сможете скрафтить свой первый самолет и попробуете осмотреть всю красоту с высоты птичьего полета, вы будете ошалены размахом разработки H2O.

Звуки в игре, как и должны быть в водном мире. Они полны тишины и спокойствия. Но только до тех пор, пока вы не встретите людей. После чего ваша жизнь изменится из спокойной исследовательской, в попытки выжить под выстрелами.

Под конец обзора хотелось бы перечислить плюсы и минусы проекта.

Плюсы:
+ Прекрасных водный мир, сошедший к нам прямо из одноименного кинофильма
+ Обширная система крафта
+ Возможность крафта сложных механизмов (лодки, самолеты, лифты и прочее)
+ Возможность постройки целой крепости с вашими друзьями

Минусы:
- Небогатая звуковая составляющая игры
- Отсутствие PVE серверов

Hide & Hold Out - одна из лучших выживалок про водный мир, которые я когда-либо видел. Моя оценка проекту 8,5 из 10.

"Вау я нашел огнестрельное оружие, ну теперь мне пираты не страшны. 5 минут спустя. Навстречу движется отряд из пяти вооруженных до зубов пиратов. Еscape -> Leave Server!!!"

[b][i] *За этот обзор я благодарен разработчику, который предоставил ключ от данной игры. Однако это никак не повлияло на мой личный взгляд на проект. [/i][/b]

[b][i][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/]Больше обзоров в нашей кураторской группе: Dreams of Genesis [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198217499484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 2795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2600, 'last_played': 1496670660}
review:
I enjoyed this game a lot so far.
The graphics are average, but ok. The balancing (weapons, strength of walls, rescources, Sharks etc.) is very well done and the amount of content is absolutely ok for an early access alpha game that has just been released. On top of that, patches come out very frequently and the devs and admins in the forum seem very friendly and communicative. 

But I'm not going to recommend to purchase this game atm, because it is absolutely overun by hackers. I played a lot of survival games and I've seen cheaters in a lot of these games, but this is far beyond playable. I played on very different servers (PVE only, Official Servers, private PVE/PVP servers) and there were hackers around at least a couple of times a day. I lost all my stuff by flying/through walls going hackers so often that I'm forced to stop playing this game. It says that with the latest patch the anti cheat system got improved. It took less than an hour to loose all of my stuff to a hacker after I downloaded the patch. You can't release a game that is obviously so vulnerable to cheating. I'm really happy to change my review into a positive one if this is solved, but for now I'm forced to avoid this game.

EDIT: As of now the game is pretty much dead. I checked the server list 3 times on 3 different days and there were less than 15 people playing the game across all servers worldwide. Cheating and admin abuse ruined this early access game imo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032947001', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 19979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14665, 'last_played': 1603968178}
review:
H2o has a dedicated and ambitious developer who is tirelessly working on fixing any errors and bugs that have arisen since launch. 

What is H2o?: Waterworld Survival. Without Kevin Costner... (Sorry ladies ;-) ) It's your regular survival situation, with water, sharks and whales. Player vs Player (with support being added for PvE), base building, crafting and vehicles. You will need boats or aircraft to get around, a vital part of the game. Above or below the water, you have plenty to explore and discover. Watch out for flying sharks!

So why purchase H2o?: Support the developers so they can continue to grow and improve this gem of a game. Early Access is not the full game, and it will take time. If you wish to give the game a chance to reach its full potential you should support it now. Even if you don't play. Wait for closer to the full version if you are looking for a fully fledged working game. Jump in now if you want to assist in finding bugs and getting them fixed. It's only though your actions, as a player, that any problems can be found and fixes be found. 

Some may think I'm bias, being part of the community team in the forums, but I've been part of the test group for some time prior to release and seen the struggle the developers have endured to get the game to release on Steam. They will need more help now that testing has turned the corner into the next phase, and with the great many avid supporters that have purchased the game I am very confident that all the issues with connections and anticheat woes will be sorted out in no time.

To add this game can be a hit after iit will leave early access ofc, Hackers is quite a big problem on the game and they even talk on a threat on how to hack this game... A lot of videos on how to glitch in this game but after all I like it and it's quite fun. - 21 April

9 September - The game progress quite well, The players that play the game have dropped down since the hacker nation attacked, Now there are no hackers devs working hard on game fixing it and stuff making it more fun, The official servers are still running, And other servers are still active with low amounts of players which is sad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986972344', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 964, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 958, 'last_played': 1461906435}
review: its 2016 and this game feels like its from 2008. Its a cool concept and good idea but its barren. Not many people play it and if youre into the base building type of games you should be playing rust. Driving around on my various water craft looking for some kinda pvp is all this had become. The pvp is just meh when it happens and its very clunky at its current state. The game is really slow paced. Its a cool game for like 5-10 bucks but thats about it. Another thing to note is that you can attack someones base and destroy one of their walls but they can just instantly replace that wall once its broken down. If you do ever find another player roaming aound and island the encounter lasts a second or two and unless you guys are lanned together there will be many latency issues where you are getting melee hit by someone who appears to be 10 yards away from you. This game is a cool idea but needs a 2016 logistcs update to graphics and overall playabilty, cause like I said it feels like an old game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996108765', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 677, 'last_played': 1460983837}
review:
木を切って木材　岩を叩いて鉱石　なんてのはまったくないすねｗ　こんもり盛り上がったスクラップの塊や流木などから資源を得る　MAP見ると分かりますがだいぶ海よりのサバイバルゲーです（大海に小島が多数な感じのMAP）再沸きするようですし困ることはないでしょうな。クラフト部分はまぁ数時間もやればだいたいの物は作れるし早い段階で海に潜り続けられる装備も作れる。海にはサメ！でかいクジラ！以上！
食われる～！と最初驚いでいましたがバグなのか仕様なのか別に攻撃してこないのでなんの恐怖もありませんｗ　しかしまぁ鯖が有料らしく現状あるサーバーに入る事になるのがちょっとね　PvE（プレイヤー同士の戦闘行為無し）の鯖に入ってしばらく仲間とやりました。割りと大きな拠点を作るに至ったのですが翌日inするとほとんどの物資などは盗まれ破壊されておりました　まぁ　こんなもんでしょうな

author: {'steamid': '76561197989976862', 'num_games_owned': 1904, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1461114634}
review:
На данный момент не могу рекомендовать эту игру по ряду причин. И в этот раз мы начнем сразу с недостатков. Так уж получилось, что я не смог найти достоинств. Для меня их попросту нет. Но сначала ключевые слова. Моя мотивация к покупке: 

Симулятор выживания. «Водный мир». Пост-апокалиптика. Рыбалка. Машина на плоту как средство передвижения.

Неплохо, да? Неплохой задел. Был бы, если был бы заделом. На деле это очередная поделка на Unity3D. И дело не в давешнем стереотипе о том, что это движок для школьников. Чтобы убедиться в обратном - взгляните на «The Long Dark», к примеру. Есть и другие игры, не менее красивые и интересные. Хорошо известно, что важен не движок, а руки людей с ним работающие. Здешние руки произрастают из странных мест.

Подобные игры собираются на коленке в течение месяца или двух. Подобные игры не более чем набор дешевых моделей и текстур купленных в Unity Asset Store. Когда разработчик делает хороший гейм-плей, покупка таких дешевых компонент бывает ускорителем процесса, и затем контент меняется на улучшенный или авторский. Здесь разработчик пошел легким путём. Минимум эффектов. Минимум звуков. Минимум текстур минимального разрешения. Минимум моделей. Стандартный для Unity3D интерфейс… словом нет ни единого места, где разработчик бы потрудился бы, и вложил бы в игру свою душу. Кто на очереди? Гейм-плей?

Симулятор нагибания. В Стиме должна появиться именно такая категория. Симулятор нагибания. Потому как к симуляторам выживания подобная игра ничего общего не имеет. Это беготня между кучками ресурсов, которые раскиданы на небольших островках. Это игра где главный принцип выживания это убежать куда-то с кучкой своего, отъесться и вернуться убивать других. Или будут убивать вас. Долго. С удовольствием. И безо всякого смысла. 
Это игра с тупым крафтом. Найди немного песочка, пару железяк и рыбный плавник – станешь обладателем автомата Калашникова. Безусловно, я утрирую, но общий принцип крафта в таких играх выглядит именно так. Бессмысленный и беспощадный сбор мусора, где из куска пластиковой бутылки, акульего зуба и кактуса собирается компьютер.  

Это игра с тупыми игроками. Потому, что ничего кроме тупой беготни с РПГ и стрельбы навесом она не предлагает. Эта игра не может дать вам возможности быть хитрым, быть опасным, быть интересным для других игроков. Это игра где лицо человека, который решил над вами поиздеваться, будет маячить перед вашим носом – постоянно. Почему? Хотя бы потому, что кирка это орудие для добычи лома из кучек шпал, но… не оружие. Вы не сможете ударить обидчика даже если захотите. Вы не сможете убить даже летающую за вами акулу. 

Пожалуй, акула, которая летала по воздуху и гоняла меня вокруг острова - самое интересное, что со мной случилось в H2O. Я понимаю и верю, что это «Ранний Доступ», но поверьте и вы мне – если разработчик хочет сделать игру и делает её, если для него это не простенькая денежная доилка, но игра… он разрабатывает её иначе. И уже в «Раннем Доступе» она выглядит как игра. 

P.S.
Моя небольшая прогулка по этой игре на YouTube:
https://youtu.be/O7upXM7eqxo

P.P.S
Единственное и искреннее веселье в этой игровой сессии в этом моменте:
https://youtu.be/O7upXM7eqxo?list=PLdUPC-Oo7Ll0pMp0vg7TkWhBHOfvoXAMG&t=1716

review:
This is beyond a shadow of a doubt the worst Early Access I have ever seen.  Takes 9 tries to launch, crashes if you do anything, and IF you are able to get in and play more than 35 seconds at a time, you will starve, fishing does not work, the sharks are ridiculous, so don't go in the water.  These guys need about 6 more months of 24/7 before this would qualify for PRE PRE PRE alpha.

Steam needs to get their heads out their arses and have some miniscule amount of standards to which a game, and I use that term in the loosest possible way can be SOLD.  And before you fantards of the WoW generation jump on me and cry early access, remember before you came along there WERE STANDARDS.  They were lowered because you are morons.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198002647652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4202, 'last_played': 1572756144}
review:
公開初日に買って毎日コツコツとプレイした結果10日で60時間ほどプレイしてしまいました。

当然まだα版なうえ、開発陣の作りたいところから作ったといった感じなので荒削りなところはありますが、【リソース管理】【対人】【ハウジング】これらのゲームが好きな方はドはまりすること請け合いです。
以下に簡単なプレイ内容の説明を書こうと思います。





まずゲーム開始、サーバーを選択すると同時にあなたはブルース・ウィ●スくりそつな丸ハゲのおっさんとなり映画ウォー●ーワールドさながらの世界に放り出されます。

広がる海原に大小さまざまな島が浮いていますが、いきなり海に飛び込まないように。
ウォーター●ールドがディープ●ルーになってしまいます。
開始時、もしくはリスポーン時に毎回支給されるraftというアイテムがあるので、海面に設置しましょう。
あとはこのイカダ（木パレ）に乗って周囲の島々を回り金属や流木、そのほかさまざまなゴミ（リソース）を集めてください。

ある程度の金属と木材が集まったら次は拠点を作りましょう。
このゲームは陸上に拠点を作る事が（現在のところ）できず、フロートを海に浮かべ、支柱をたて壁を張り・・・最後に天井を張って拠点を作ります、もちろんドアも付けてください。
勢い余って鋼鉄の棺桶を作って閉じ込められて餓死しないように・・・

拠点が完成したら次はシップヤードという施設を設置しましょう。
大型の物は大量のリソースが必要になりますが、これを作成してからがこのゲームの本番です。
ジェットスキーやホバーボート、果てには巨大な移動要塞を建造し北斗のモヒカンよろしく徒党を組んで略奪にお出かけしましょう。
もちろん相手を殺すわけですから殺されもします。
（現在のところこのゲームにはパンクバスター等がないので、世紀末覇者バリに華のチーターが大暴れしています、転んでも泣かない）

最終的には動くもの全てがあなたのリソースに見えてきます。

author: {'steamid': '76561197998898986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 4332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2316, 'last_played': 1525204335}
review:
Alors...
Tu aimes les jeux de plateformes (on parlera pas ici de mario ou donkey kong... ok) ?
Tu aimes la pêche?
Tu aimes le jetski ?
Tu aimes la plongée?
Tu aimes ramasser des coquillages ?
Tu aimes tirer au fusil de sniper ?
Tu aimes construire des maisons ou des bases ?
Tu aimes buter des types (pirates) qui veulent te piquer tes poissons ou ton pain?
Tu aimes jouer avec tes potes ?

Alors tu trouveras ce que tu cherches dans ce jeu ouvert, où le craft et le pvp sont les incontournables actuels.
Certes on pense à #RUST, #STRANDEDDEEP, quand on y joue, mais le concept de base construite sur l'eau est tout à fait innovant, tout comme la conduite d'engins comme l'hélico monoplace, l'hydravion 3 places etc...
À découvrir car #Hide&HoldOut est un bon complément à #RUST dans ce monde où semblent se noyer pas mal de jeux de survie.

Aller hop, TOUS À L'EAU !

PS : Penses à te munir d'un harpon car les requins te rateront pas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993738461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 5487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3778, 'last_played': 1462892714}
review:
Great game, awesome concept with lots of potential. With the vehicles it's simply Rust on steroids. For an alpha the game runs fairly smooth. Being able to fly AND drive ships gives clans a lot of room to play with different startegies.

Word of advice though: Wait a few months before you get this. Right now there's just waay too many hackers (from the classic aim bot all the way to blowing up everyone's ships and manipulating other players' inventory - easily available from sites like these https://goo.gl/qxYGmy) and players abusing admin privelages on private run servers (giving themselves 100x rockets so they can go grief, etc.). There's even a pirated version floating around with hacks already integrated, which may explain the abundance of hackers across servers (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4IoCZbzvBDQ). Right now there's only 4 official servers with barely any admin oversight. If you don't want to wait you will be able to find the occasional empty server that allows you to explore and experiment with the game.

Until the game is actually playable as the game design inteded I cannot recommend the game. Should the security issues be adressed at some point I will update my review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079697851', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2210, 'last_played': 1466784417}
review:
Окей! Наиграл я в эту игру уже много времени. Во 1-ых что мне понравилось:
1. Необычное ощущение т.к на воде.
2. Красивая графика
3. Хорошая механика боя. Оружие сбалансированно ( например снайпа: ею доволно трудно попасть из далека, ак: есть отдача и тому подобное) 
Минусы
1. рассинхрон ( ты можешь находиться в 1 месте, а убьют тебя в другом)
2.Очень много читеров ( это главный минус. Расскажу тру стори: мы играли с другом, строились 8 часов. Потом зашли читеры мы с ними посрались и в итоге: они за час выстроили большой железный дом и потом они нас разбомбили )

author: {'steamid': '76561198109803403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1462445534}
review:
Cherchant une alternative à Rust et Ark Survival Evolved, je suis tombé sur ce jeu. 

Sur le même principe que Rust de façon générale, c'est un survival/craft. Ne cherchez pas ici de zombies, ours transgenique ou bestioles sorties de la cave des enfers, sur H2o le plus gros predateur PNJ (et le seul d'ailleurs), c'est le requin...
En effet H2o est un jeu qu'il faut voir comme un waterworld: tout est presenté comme se passant sur et sous l'eau.  
Vous vous en rendez compte rapidement quand vous comprenez que vous ne pouvez pas construire sur les ilots de terre.
Cependant pour le moment, ce qu'il se passe sous l'eau est très limité, il faut espérer par la suite que cette partie soit plus développée.
A partir de la c'est un survival classique: explorer, survivre, recolter les ressources, crafter.

Concernant le craft justement, c'est un craft a plusieurs niveaux, il vous faudra collecter des ressources que vous devrez transformer en ressources de meilleure qualité afin de crafter les éléments finaux. 
Dû à l'early access ou pas, les éléments à crafter ne sont pas tous spécifiés dans votre inventaire de craft, les tutos et google seront donc vos amis pour vous expliquer comment obtenir certains éléments dont vous aurez besoin et qui ne sont pas listés.

Il y a pas mal de possibilités dès votre arrivée, et un accès assez rapide à des éléments essentiels à votre survie PvP (jetski, armes, etc...)

N'espérez pas cependant avoir enormément d'interactions PVE.
N'achetez pas H2O pour faire du PVE, en tout cas, en l'état actuel. Il est résolument tourné PvP.

Dans les points positifs, on voit une marge de progression énorme entre l'état du jeu actuel en Early Access, et ce qu'il peut résolument devenir. J'ai hate de voir les implémentations que vont prévoir les devs.
Niveau opti, c'est un super boulot. Même sur un serveur full il y a très peu de lag et le jeu tourne très bien. Pourtant ma connexion est vraiment pourrie. Donc ca c'est un réel plus.

Dans les points négatifs, je regretterais juste le manque d'un systeme de level up qui donnerait de suite des priorités ingame, absente à ce jour: niveau storytelling c'est assez limité, mais l'accès rapide au gros craft donne un but.
Le système d'inventaire est intuitif mais peu développé, il manque quelques options permettant des transferts d'objets par lots ou de meilleurs outils de regroupement, ca devient vite le bordel.

En conclusion:
Plus orienté PVP que PVE, H2O est une pépite en devenir. Si les devs suivent, et que l'early access permet de faire évoluer quelques éléments et en ajouter d'autres, ca va être très fun!
